sqlMap.select:
SELECT BATCH_ID ,BATCH_DATE ,PRDER_AMT ,CREATE_DATE ,FINISH_TIME ,TRANS_FEE ,ORDEER_COUNT ,STATUS ,RESERVAED1 ,RESERVAED2 ,RESERVAED3 FROM SUB_MER_CASHOUT_BATCH WHERE 1=1 AND SUB_MER_CASHOUT_BATCH.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(BATCH_ID) =#batch_id#
(BATCH_DATE) =#batch_date#
(PRDER_AMT) Like '%'||(#prder_amt:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_DATE) Like '%'||(#create_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FINISH_TIME) Like '%'||(#finish_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_FEE) Like '%'||(#trans_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ORDEER_COUNT) Like '%'||(#ordeer_count:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVAED1) Like '%'||(#reservaed1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVAED2) Like '%'||(#reservaed2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVAED3) Like '%'||(#reservaed3:VARCHAR#)||'%'
$orderStr$

SELECT count(1) FROM SUB_MER_CASHOUT_BATCH WHERE 1=1 AND SUB_MER_CASHOUT_BATCH.END_DATE=TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'yyyy-MM-dd')
(BATCH_ID) =#batch_id#
(BATCH_DATE) =#batch_date#
(PRDER_AMT) Like '%'||(#prder_amt:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(CREATE_DATE) Like '%'||(#create_date:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(FINISH_TIME) Like '%'||(#finish_time:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(TRANS_FEE) Like '%'||(#trans_fee:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(ORDEER_COUNT) Like '%'||(#ordeer_count:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(STATUS) Like '%'||(#status:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVAED1) Like '%'||(#reservaed1:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVAED2) Like '%'||(#reservaed2:VARCHAR#)||'%'
(RESERVAED3) Like '%'||(#reservaed3:VARCHAR#)||'%'
